amendment.description: An amendment numbered 18 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit the use of funds to kill bison, or assist in the killing of bison, in the Yellowstone National Park herd.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hinchey amendment (A013) Failed by recorded vote: 202 - 215 (Roll no. 261).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A013) offered by Mr. Hinchey.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Hinchey amendment (A013) Failed by recorded vote: 202 - 215 (Roll no. 261).
